### Summary

Reviewed the PR and submitted a `REQUEST_CHANGES` verdict. Found **1 critical issue**, **1 warning**, and **2 nitpicks**:

| Severity | Issue | Location |
|----------|-------|----------|
| ðŸ”´ Critical | Opt-out state not loaded on startup â€” privacy violation | `src/index.js:293` |
| ðŸŸ¡ Warning | Memory defaults to enabled when config fails | `src/modules/memory.js:97` |
| ðŸ”µ Nitpick | Missing `markUnavailable()` in delete functions | `src/modules/memory.js:329, 349` |
| ðŸ”µ Nitpick | Test has unawaited promise | `tests/modules/memory.test.js:176` |

The critical issue (`loadOptOuts()` not being called during startup) means that after a bot restart, previously opted-out users' messages will be sent to mem0, violating their explicit privacy choice. This must be fixed before merging.

See inline comments for detailed explanations and suggested fixes.
